content.question: The increase in the popularity of jazz music was most directly caused by which of the following developments in the early 20th century?

choices.label: The growth of African American artistic expression in the Harlem Renaissance
The growth of resistance to racial violence during the nadir
The rise of efforts to counter negative stereotypes about African Americans at the time
The rise in African American activism against segregation in the South

content.answer: The growth of African American artistic expression in the Harlem Renaissance

topic.text: 3.14: Symphony in Black: Black Performance in Music, Theater, and Film

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
